column4: hello trying to find some help for a wireless card unclaimed run iwconfig with all 0's
using Karmic
is the wireless card supported by the kernel?
hmmm.... what type of wireless card are you using? what does sudo lsmod report? can you pastbin the output from it?
do you see any errors when running - dmesg
pasted
ok, paste the link into the irc channel for me =)
hmm
http://paste.ubuntu.com/334645/
when you left click on your network icon in the gnome gui, is the wireless option listed?
no... my wireless is unclaimed
how about running the hardware drivers app from system->Administration
!ru | STALIWAR
I don't understan STALIWAR??
srry, I miss typed
did you run the System->Administration->Hardware Drivers app?
yes it
hmm, is this an external or internal card? do you have to hit a button to turn on your wireless on your laptop?
internal internal, I do have an on/off switch it is on... this is my lshw -c network link http://paste.ubuntu.com/334651/
odd, it shows on line 16 that you have an IP address assigned
try sudo rmmod sky2; sudo moprobe sky2; then run dmesg
physical ID 0? I thought that didn't mean anything
line 16 of the pastebin...
